Package cz.cuni.mff.java.projects.posapp.plugins.products

Class ProductGroupsModel

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.java.projects.posapp.plugins.products.ProductGroupsModel
public class ProductGroupsModel extends Object
Model holding the product groups hierarchy. Implemented as Singleton.

    • getGroupChildren

      public Stream<GroupComboBoxItem> getGroupChildren(Integer parentId)

      Parameters:

      Stream containing the child groups

    • getGroups

      public ArrayList<GroupComboBoxItem> getGroups()
      Get all the groups that were fetched from the database as ComboBoxItems.
      Returns:
      groups

    • getOrderedGroups

      public ArrayList<GroupComboBoxItem> getOrderedGroups()
      Get the groups that were queried in the database. First performs a hierarchical DFS ordering. Use this method to display groups in text or JComboBox. The groups are ordered such that a parent group is followed by every of its children and their children recursively before any other group. Ordering of root parents is same as in the database.
      Returns:
      ordered groups

    • insertNewGroup

      public void insertNewGroup(HashMap<String,ProductInputComponent> userInputs) throws SQLException
      Insert a newly added group into the model and into the database
      Parameters:
      userInputs - input components with the new group data
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database insert fails
